text: “In a week you can change your position.” Pellegrini was thrilled by @MCFC’s win at #saintsfc: http://t.co/1XdulX7bQS http://t.co/7fnpE6afsV
Three budget midfielders made the Gameweek 13 Dream Team. Could they provide you with some #FPL inspiration? http://t.co/y2m7of0eyW
After a 48-hour break, the #BPL is back on Tuesday. Here are some storylines to look out for across Matchweek 14... http://t.co/LSGe1gVg4q
NEW POLL What's your prediction for @Arsenal v @SouthamptonFC on Wednesday? Have your say at http://t.co/MpvmiH2CSo http://t.co/5N13l1fFwy
TEAM NEWS Three changes for @stokecity as Ireland, Assaidi and Bardsley replace Sidwell, Walters and Arnautovic #MUNSTK
PHOTO No goals in the first 17 mins at the Liberty Stadium but there have been good chances at both ends #SWAQPR http://t.co/nnyZ3D7mwQ
GOAL Palace 0-1 Villa (32 mins) Christian Benteke wins the ball on the left & goes on a driving run before slotting past Speroni #CRYAVL
GOAL Man Utd 2-1 Stoke (59 mins) Juan Mata's curling free-kick from the right evades everyone and ends up in the far corner #MUNSTK
FULL-TIME Burnley 1-1 Newcastle. Cisse salvages a point for Newcastle but Burnley climb out of the bottom 3 #BURNEW http://t.co/JXDnc8bFI4
TABLE Here's how the #BPL table looks after six action-packed matches on Tuesday night... http://t.co/PPSlmUfvtg
In case you missed it, here's Tuesday's results in the #BPL - including wins for @ManUtd & @LFC: http://t.co/jXcB6urF6L
Girls representing #BPL clubs were among those to enjoy the FA Girls' Football Festival. More: http://t.co/ZJMgmUI5sC http://t.co/D0g6PrVdVK
WATCH @SunderlandAFC’s Stadium of Light has not been a happy hunting ground for @MCFC in recent years: http://t.co/GfWrRtkokb #SUNMCI
KICK-OFF Tonight's 4 #BPL matches are under way. Keep up with all the goals as they go in at: http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V http://t.co/5RbU4ctFO8
GOAL Sunderland 1-2 Man City (39 mins) Aguero touches on a pass from Yaya Toure for Stevan Jovetic to fire past Pantilimon #SUNMCI
SUB After 2 goals & an assist, Aguero is replaced by Lampard. Sunderland 1-4 Man City (74 mins) #SUNMCI
It's vote time at http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V Who would you rather have in your team, Aguero or Sanchez? http://t.co/rNen9jaqGE
.@Arsenal have scored 7 goals in the final 5 minutes of #BPL matches this season, more than any other side http://t.co/X7jwAKqwYR
TABLE With Matchweek 14 done and dusted, take a look at the latest Barclays Premier League table... #BPL http://t.co/Mz7p63E1Fr
WATCH Remember @NUFC fighting back from 4 goals down in 2011? Relive the drama on Day 4 of our #BPL Advent Calendar: http://t.co/oShBd2PHu7
24 HOURS TO DEADLIINE Is it time to bring @bentekechris20 into your #FPL set-up? Scout Extra: http://t.co/kp7aKhEVN9 http://t.co/0Fk6hvjlUO

Rooney 178, 
Henry 175, 
Lampard 174
They're all set for action on Saturday... Can you wait for the #BPL matches to begin? http://t.co/VCRzl7aXLa

#BPLLive will see live matches on a massive screen next weekend at MMRDA Mumbai - for FREE! http://t.co/CO156zFtlf
https://t.co/TQxctdmALo
#BPL Matchweek 15 is under way at St James' Park. It's Newcastle v Chelsea. Join the action: http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V http://t.co/nmff03dbNA
GOAL Newcastle 2-0 Chelsea (78 mins). @NUFC break quickly and @CissePapiss tucks in at the back post for his second of the match #NEWCHE
TEAM NEWS @QPRFC make 2 changes, with Isla & Zamora replacing Onuoha & Kranjcar. @BurnleyOfficial make 1 change with Mee in for Ward #QPRBUR
WOODWORK George Boyd's thunderbolt from distance is tipped onto the upright by Rob Green & it's still QPR 0-0 Burnley after 30 mins #QPRBUR
GOAL Stoke 3-1 Arsenal (68 mins). Begovic gets a hand on it, but @19SCazorla converts the penalty to pull one back for the visitors #STKARS
FULL-TIME Stoke 3-2 Arsenal. Crouch scores after 19 secs as @stokecity's first-half salvo earns all 3 points #STKARS http://t.co/3L2PyDkvi2
PHOTO An injured @aguerosergiokun comes off after 7 minutes. It's Man City 0-0 Everton (20 mins) #MCIEVE http://t.co/E5KbLUjiK2
.@YayaToure's penalty is still the difference at the Etihad. Twenty minutes remain... Man City 1-0 Everton #MCIEVE http://t.co/hryvxozXmf
.@NUFC inflicted the 1st #BPL defeat of the season on @chelseafc. Full report: http://t.co/hzP0y5xbwv http://t.co/QsZiwv6NDV
Spurs 0-0 Palace. Thirty attempts but no goals in a tense White Hart Lane encounter. Report: http://t.co/424pIC57zT http://t.co/3nGPSYwaxf
STAT PACK "I've been massively impressed with the way West Ham have turned it around" says @mattholland8. Watch: http://t.co/mcmEfRcqjF
TEAM NEWS @whufc_official bring in Song and Valencia for Amalfitano and Zarate, while Rangel replaces Taylor for @SwansOfficial #WHUSWA
HALF-TIME West Ham 1-1 Swansea. Carroll's commanding header cancels out Bony's 7th #BPL goal of the season #WHUSWA http://t.co/hRa3yrIG0U
WOODWORK @iamdiafrasakho gets through on goal but his shot hits the bottom of the far post. West Ham 2-1 Swansea (77 mins) #WHUSWA
GOAL Aston Villa 0-1 Leicester (13 mins). Guzan fails to deal with a deflected shot and Leonardo Ulloa pokes home for the opener #AVLLEI
GOAL Aston Villa 2-1 Leicester (71 mins). Alan Hutton chests down Benteke's pass and smashes home from close range #AVLLEI
